Class AbstractServer

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.AbstractServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
HelloServer, NewHelloServer, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelloUDPNonblockingServer, HelloUDPServer
public abstract class AbstractServer extends Object implements NewHelloServer
Abstract class representing UDP server.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

    • start

      public void start(int threads, Map<Integer,String> ports)
      Starts a new Hello server. This method should return immediately.
      Specified by:
      start in interface NewHelloServer
      Parameters:
      threads - number of working threads.
      ports - port no to response format mapping.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the server has been already stared
      UncheckedIOException - if a SocketException is occurred

    • listen

      protected void listen(AbstractServer.IORunnable listenWork)
      A listener, that will loop and invoke the provided action. If exception is occurred - it's logged and the listener's loop stops.
      Parameters:
      listenWork - a work to do each iteration of the listen loop
